<Heading
  as={"h1"}

  children={"Retrieve an Account's Data"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/accounts/{account_id}/data/{key}"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This endpoint represents a single data for a given account.
